answers.answer: I'm 29 weeks and my doctor measured me at 33 cm. I don't have GB. It's just how baby's positioned in my case. Im only 5"4 and also been gaining 2 lbs per week now. Hope this helps put your mind at ease! Good luck!

Yes that gives me some hope. I just can't wait for appt. I don't want baby getting so large. And of course if I had gb then I want to try to correct it as soon as possible. Have u consistently measured higher too? Even at my ultrasound at 21 wks, they thought baby may weigh a little more but I knew that wasn't always accurate so I didn't get disturbed until they thought I measured high.
At 20 weeks at the ultrasound she measured a bit small in the 35th percentile, but my uterus has constantly been measuring big.

question: I was measuring 28 cm at 23+5.... which is like 3-4 weeks ahead apparently? I am now 27 weeks today and two days ago I measured myself at 31 cm. Really hope I don't have gestational diabetes.... I don't get glucose test till I am 28+6.... So ready. Want the doctor to do another ultrasound because it worries me that baby is growing too fast. I started at 110 And I am 5'1. I've gained 25 lbs... 5 of those in just the last two weeks!? what the heck!? :/ at my last appointment she was shocked my uterus measured higher than she expected but she said maybe I had a growth spurt.. but clearly it's not slowing down. What are you measuring and how far along? With our without GB? This is my first baby. Am I crazy or are these measurements pretty high? From researching it seems average measurements should match weeks at this point...thanks.
title: with or without GB? measuring?
